problem_text: Find the perimeter of the \triangle A B C, if \triangle A B C \sim \triangle C B D, A D = 5, C D = 12, and B C = 31.2.
compact_text: Find the perimeter of the \triangle ABC, if \triangle ABC \sim \triangle CBD, AD = 5, CD = 12, and BC = 31.2.
annotat_text: Find the perimeter of the $\triangle A B C,$ if $\triangle A B C \sim \triangle C B D, A D=5$, $C D=12,$ and $B C=31.2$
